scripts.dev-all: pnpm dev & cd ../demo-api-sdk && pnpm dev & cd ../ui-cool-app-shared && pnpm dev
scripts.clone-deps: cd .. && (git clone git@github.com:cat-demo-org/ui-cool-app-shared.git || echo 'already exists') && (git clone git@github.com:cat-demo-org/demo-api-sdk.git || echo 'already exists') && (git clone git@github.com:cat-demo-org/ui-web-components.git || echo 'already exists')
scripts.link-deps: pnpm link ../ui-web-components; pnpm link ../ui-cool-app-shared; cd ../ui-cool-app-shared && pnpm link-deps
